# atlaspoissons

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of {atlaspoissons} is to gather a set of functions to produce the atlas of freshwater fishes of Britanny.

## Installation

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("PascalIrz/atlaspoissons")
```
